question: What is the theme of the “World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought"?
explanation:
“World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought” is celebrated on June 17, every year across the world.
UN General Assembly declared June 17 as the specified World Day, to promote public awareness of the issues of Desertification and Drought. This year, the theme is "Food.Feed.Fibre: Sustainable production and consumption." The United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification leads the observance.
